chapter.text: You allow things to change. ^1500You allow for unpredictability,^500 which has been making these stories interesting for me. ^1500You see, before you came along,^500 I created,^500 and it was good,^500 but now you are something more within the original itself. ^1500Your reactions,^500 your questions,^500 your responses,^500 are all things I canâ€™t predict.
